action.action-desc: Ms. Titus (for herself, Mrs. Kirkpatrick, Mr. Cole, Mrs. Napolitano, Ms. McCollum, Mrs. Christensen, Mr. Cárdenas, and Mr. Takano) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to furnish headstones and markers for certain deceased veterans buried in veterans’ cemeteries of Indian tribes.

section.header: Headstones and markers for placement in tribal veterans’ cemeteries
section.text: Section 2306 of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(4), by inserting or in a veterans’ cemetery on land owned by or held in trust for a tribal organization (as defined in section 3765(4) of this title) after State; and
in subsection (b)(1), by inserting a veterans’ cemetery on land owned by or held in trust for a tribal organization, after a veterans’ cemetery owned by a State,.
